doc.title: Big Brown Eyes
doc.plot: The dB's sing "You Give Me Something To Think About" on the soundtrack and an animated short functions like a rock video. The pair of big brown eyes, sometimes atop a mobile stick figure, sometimes part of a morphing line of simple lines and colors, appear in nearly every frame. The brown-eyed figure heads down stairs, becomes bodiless legs, and generally keeps pace with the music's fast beat. Occasionally, a cluster of faces, sort of like balloons, float up and out of the frame.
